WorkItem.ClosedComment: Unable to reproduce, this is probably fixed in the last 9 months
WorkItem.Description:
First try using rawr3 on Mac OS X.
 
-loaded my char from armory (Shadow Pries lvl80: Dachquox, Dunemaul-EU)
-made some changes to buffs
-selected gear view in right pane
-opened optimizer
-added one rule: Hit rating ≥ 289
-checked Mixology and Elixir/Flask
-clicked optimize button
 
Result:
Immediate freeze. To the left of the Cancel button I read: -1E+07

Comments.Message: -1E+07 means -10000000, it's the starting point in the optimizer, after that massive negative number, *anything* is bigger so it start working upward in value with your gear/enchants, etc.

Yes, but in the reported case, I waited about 1 minute without anything happening.
My CPU meter didn't show it doing any work, and I could not regain control by clicking cancel or otherwise...
Please post the character file (since Armory can change)

I just did a fresh load from the Armory: same result

Then I loaded the saved character Dachquox.xml, and:
-unchecked Mana Spring Totem
-unchecked Improved Scorch
-switched to gear view
-opened optimizer
-added Hit≥289
-checked Elixir/Flask and Mixology
-clicked Optimize button

Result:
This time, the process ran to 100%, and then froze. In another attempt, i have seen it pop up a window with before/after gearset, but this time it didn't. Clicking the Cancel button also has no visible effect.

PS. Is it possible to add the equivalent of an hourglass cursor and/or a progress bar, when Rawr3 is working for more than say 2 sec?
